short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to block everything under your cursor, allowing you to read the lowest line easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you struggle to read huge blocks of text? I know I do!

Using the Read Easy extension, you can underline the line of text you are focusing on, and block out the text below, allow you to... wait for it... wait for it.... READ EASY!
